title.rendered: WinSPMBT 2018 v12 – Download for PC Free

content.rendered:
Among most Wargame emulators have a certain tradition of emulating battles between tanks and armored vehicles. WinSPMBT is a game for Windows based on the classic Steel Panther’s Main Battle Tank based in which you defeat your enemies with the help of their heavy artillery have to turn off.

Control different battle tanks

The battles are turn-based and can be played by up to two players. Paraguay and Uruguay were added as new nations, so that total 90 countries be available. You just have to choose the nation you want to play with, that date of the confrontation (from the end of World War II to the year 2020) and based on the hexagonal game board move.

The game retains the essence of the original, but the dates and game modes have been changed, to adapt to the new times. Three new scenarios and a new campaign have been added, giving you a total of 107 scenarios be available.

WinSPMBT allows you into the Role of a real combat soldier to slip aboard a heavy artillery unit. Move your troops and eliminate your enemies before they try to to do the same to you.
